articles.author: Priyaja Bakshi
articles.title: Northern Lights Encore! What To Know June's Possible Aurora Show - Travel + Leisure Southeast Asia
articles.description: Did you miss or see the Northern Lights in May? You get another chance as 2024's strong solar activity may bring the auroras back in June.
articles.content:
Image credit: Denis Belitsky/Shutterstock
This year has seen brighter-than-usual auroras, painting the skies in green, pink, blue and purple hues. If you missed the beauty of the northern lights in … [+2312 chars]
